data.comment: The match has started at King Power Stadium.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Leicester.
In the minute 1, Man Utd to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Anthony Martial of Man Utd is pulled up for offside.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Martin Atkinson awards Leicester a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Martin Atkinson signals a Leicester throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Leicester.
Harry Maguire (Man Utd) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 11, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
In Leicester, Mason Greenwood (Man Utd) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leicester.
Throw-in for Man Utd at King Power Stadium.
Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
In the minute 14, Leicester's Onyinye Wilfred Ndidi misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Man Utd at King Power Stadium.
Throw-in Leicester.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Leicester are coming forward and Marc Albrighton gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
Leicester to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
Leicester awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leicester's Kelechi Iheanacho is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 25, Leicester's Jamie Vardy has run offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leicester.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Leicester.
Martin Atkinson blows against Man Utd's Bruno Fernandes for offside.
Leicester's Youri Tielemans breaks free at King Power Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bruno Fernandes.
Man Utd's Bruno Fernandes is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Jamie Vardy for Leicester gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Man Utd are pushing forward but Marcus Rashford's finish is wide of the goal.
Martin Atkinson awards Leicester a goal kick.
Throw-in for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 43, Martin Atkinson signals a Leicester throw-in in Man Utd's half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Leicester.
In Leicester, Anthony Martial of Man Utd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Mason Greenwood gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man Utd.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at King Power Stadium.
Martin Atkinson has blown to start the second-half.
Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Leicester close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 49, Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Man Utd.
Leicester to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
In the minute 53, Leicester push forward at King Power Stadium and Kelechi Iheanacho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Man Utd defence.
Throw-in Leicester.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 58, Brendan Rodgers is making the team's first substitution at King Power Stadium with Ayoze Perez replacing Kelechi Iheanacho.
Martin Atkinson signals a Leicester throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Leicester in Leicester.
In the minute 59, Man Utd needs to be cautious. Leicester have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Leicester.
Leicester drive upfield at King Power Stadium and Jamie Vardy hits the bar with a header.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Man Utd at King Power Stadium.
Youri Tielemans (Leicester) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
In the minute 62, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leicester's Jonny Evans is whistled for offside at King Power Stadium.
Free kick for Leicester in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 63, Victor Lindelof (Man Utd) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leicester.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Man Utd have been awarded a penalty in Leicester...
Jonny Evans (Leicester) has received a yellow card from Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 71, Goal! Man Utd take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Bruno Fernandes spot-kick..
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Man Utd.
The home team have replaced Marc Albrighton with Demarai Gray. This is the second substitution made today by Brendan Rodgers.
Harvey Barnes is replacing Youri Tielemans for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 73, Leicester make their fourth substitution with Dennis Praet replacing Hamza Choudhury.
Throw-in for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 75, Harvey Barnes of Leicester smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Man Utd at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 77, Jesse Lingard is on a sub for Mason Greenwood for Man Utd.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Leicester's Demarai Gray gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
In the minute 79, Leicester to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Can Leicester capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Man Utd's half?
Leicester surge into the attack at King Power Stadium but Jamie Vardy’s header is off-target.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Leicester in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 81, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Free kick Man Utd.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Man Utd.
In the minute 83, Demarai Gray of Leicester gets in a strike, but is off target.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
Free kick Leicester.
In the minute 84, Nemanja Matic (Man Utd) has received a first yellow card.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer (Man Utd) is making a second substitution, with Scott McTominay replacing Bruno Fernandes.
Martin Atkinson signals a Man Utd throw-in in Leicester's half.
Martin Atkinson awards Leicester a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Man Utd have a goal kick.
Brendan Rodgers (Leicester) is making a fifth substitution, with George Hirst replacing Luke Thomas.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Leicester.
In Leicester Leicester drive forward through George Hirst. His shot is on target but it's saved.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Leicester!
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
Man Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
Scott McTominay has recovered and rejoins the match in Leicester.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leicester.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
At King Power Stadium, Paul Pogba has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Brandon Williams is booked for the away team.
Jonny Evans Leicester.
The match at King Power Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Scott McTominay, who is down injured.
Odion Ighalo is replacing Marcus Rashford for Man Utd at King Power Stadium.
Goal! Jesse Lingard extends Man Utd's lead to 0-2.
